author: ETA PRIME
description:
If you’re into Android handhelds, emulation, or portable gaming, the Odin 3 looks like a real generational jump over the Odin 2. Between the Snapdragon 8 Elite, up to 24GB RAM, 1TB internal storage plus microSD, that 120Hz OLED, and the built-in tools for controller mapping and performance tuning, this is the most powerful ARM handheld I’ve tested on the channel so far.
This is just a first look, not my full review. I’ll have more Odin 3 videos on emulation, Android gaming, and PC game performance coming up soon, so definitely let me know what you want to see next.

Learn More Here: https://www.ayntec.com/products/ayn-odin-3?sca_ref=9882300.ExzzUJHDgM
